db:abstract.db:para: A persistent side panel with Drawer.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = sidepanel QT += quick
SOURCES += \ sidepanel.cpp
RESOURCES += \ doc/images/qtquickcontrols2-sidepanel-landscape.png \ doc/images/qtquickcontrols2-sidepanel-portrait.png \ images/qt-logo@2x.png \ images/qt-logo@3x.png \ images/qt-logo@4x.png \ images/qt-logo.png \ sidepanel.qml
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/quickcontrols2/sidepanel INSTALLS += target
